cleaned_text: Date and time: Tuesday, 28 February 2023 at 7 pm The Balinese believe that Kajeng Kliwon is a sacred day as mentioned in both the 'lontar', a type of palm-leaf manuscript from Indonesian history culture, and the Balinese calendars. Kajeng Kliwon comes after the full moon or once every 15 days. Balinese use this day for introspection and quiet meditation. Join the Usada forum and Andri for Ancient Kawi Mantra & Meditation, in which Andri will guide you into a practice that stills the mind and opens the heart to embrace compassion. It is through self-awareness and practice that one integrates the wisdom that happiness originates from within and arises by embracing unconditional love for oneself and others. Born and raised in Yogyakarta, Andri Wijaya shares sacred music, guided meditation, ancient Javanese mantra, and herbal medicine that originates from his homeland. Cost: IDR 200K+ If you'd like to attend, please pre-register Whatsapp at +6281246891734
